ProjectTitle: Shaping functional ecosystems of the future
InitialFeedbackHistory:
21/06/2024
Good DMP, some minor suggestions: 

Findable: Since you will use RDR and Figshare, you can add there that these make your data findable by assigning a permanent identifier (DOI) and by applying metadata that follows the datacite standard so they can be harvested and indexed, you can also add which keywords you will add and whether you follow a standard vocabulary. If you like to get a DOI for your code you can import it from gitlab to RDR: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr/integration-dashboard
Interoperable: you write "see Metadata standards" but I don't see which standards you refer to here
Reuseable: Which license will you use for code? (https://ufal.github.io/public-license-selector/) The internal storage (K drive) fits better under allocation of resources
You can remove the GDPR and DPIA tab by unchecking these boxes in DMPonline under downloads.
